TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UnauthorizedWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart
Public NotInheritable Class UnauthorizedWebPart Inherits ProxyWebPart

summary.span: 在每次 控件的 方法对 控件返回 时，用于创建一个占位符对象。

span.span: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the control's method returns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集提供了一个授权机制，用于确定是否单个可以向页面添加控件。The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual controls can be added to a page. 开发人员可以根据需要分配到一个任意字符串属性控件。Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the property on a control. 当控件将控件添加到页上，它会检查根据条件设置由开发人员，使用此筛选器值方法，并返回`false`如果控件未被授权。When the control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized. > [!NOTE] > 此机制也适用于服务器控件和用户控件，都将置于区域，因为这些控件进行包装对象在运行时，而该对象继承属性。This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in zones, because these controls are wrapped with a object at run time, and this object inherits the property. 当未授权控件，控制插入到在未经授权的控件的位置页上的控件树的控件。When a control is not authorized, the control inserts an control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control. 控制树中的控件保留在页中，未经授权的控件的位置，并可以防止用户可能具有之前应用于任何个性化数据丢失的控件。An control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the control from being lost. 控件永远不会显示在页上，在其中插入该实体，也不会出现在呈现的页面的源代码。The control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page. 开发人员可以通过检查来验证如果它存在于页面控件树属性控件。Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. 下面的代码示例的第一部分是一个自定义重写的控件方法来创建自定义授权条件。The first part of the code example is a custom control that overrides the method to create custom authorization criteria. 任何具有的控制其将授权属性设置为特定值或分配给属性，没有值的任何控件，以及未被授权控件不满足这些条件。Any control that has its property set to a specific value, or any control that has no value assigned to the property, will be authorized, and controls not meeting these criteria will not be authorized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例的第二个部分是承载自定义程序的 Web 页控件。The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control. 有三个声明中的静态服务器控件``元素。There are three static server controls declared within the `` element. 尽管这些控件不是实际控件，它们将自动换行与对象在运行时，因此你可以将它们视为控制并因此将值分配给其属性。Although these controls are not actually controls, they will be wrapped with a object at run time, so you can treat them as controls and thus assign values to their properties. 请注意，控件有设置应启用它要为其授权，根据在自定义的条件的值为其筛选器控件。Notice that the control has its filter set to the value that should enable it to be authorized, according to the criteria in the custom control. 控件有一个筛选器值，应会导致其无法进行授权。The control has a filter value that should cause it not to be authorized. 控件不将值分配给属性，因此默认情况下应获得授权。The control does not assign a value to the property, so by default it should be authorized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三个部分是必须在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件描述文件中添加的设置。The third part of the code example is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保你有此代码示例为 Web 页相同的目录中的 Web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 在``部分中，请确保有``具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如下所示的以下标记。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 加载在浏览器中，页，并请注意，和按预期方式呈现控件但由于未授权，则不会呈现控件。Load the page in a browser, and notice that the and controls are rendered as expected, but the control is not rendered because it was not authorized. 单击**列表 web 部件控件**按钮原因控件列表中的所有控件的 Id 及其集合。Clicking the **List WebPart Controls** button causes the control to list the IDs of all controls in its collection. 请注意，ID系统列出了控件，可证明，控件已添加到页面控件树，若要保留它的位置，即使该标签不呈现在页中。Note that the ID for the control is listed, proving that an control was added to the page control tree to hold its place, even though the label is not rendered in the page.

summary.span: 初始化 控件的新实例的属性数据。

span.span: Initializes property data for a new instance of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数，在这两个其重载调用基类构造函数类。The constructor, in both of its overloads, calls base constructors in the class. 这些构造函数初始化属性数据并创建的新实例控件。These constructors each initialize property data and create a new instance of an control. 当添加控件控件 （和其他服务器或用户控件） 到其集合中的控件，它会检查每个控件使用方法。When the control is adding controls (and other server or user controls) to its collection of controls, it checks each control using the method. 如果控件实例未被授权，某些控件 （如其 ID) 的属性值被分配到属性在新控件，与控件然后添加到失败，在控件的位置页上的控制树授权。If a control instance is not authorized, certain property values from the control (such as its ID) are assigned to properties in a new control, and the control is then added to the control tree of the page in place of the control that failed authorization. 控件永远不会呈现在页中，并且用户无法知道它是否存在。An control is never rendered in a page, and a user has no way of knowing it is there. 但是，控件还可作为一个占位符，保持在控制树中，原始的控件的位置和维护原始控件的任何预先存在个性化数据。However, an control also acts as a placeholder, maintaining the position of the original control in the control tree, and maintaining any preexisting personalization data for the original control. 这样一来，如果用户以前个性化控件，该站点将成为未经授权由于某种原因，并且更高版本才得到授权，可以还原该用户的个性化数据。That way, if a user previously personalized a control, it then becomes unauthorized for some reason, and later it is authorized again, the user's personalization data can be restored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: A that has failed to be authorized by the control.

summary.span: 初始化 控件的新实例，在某个静态 控件（或者服务器控件或用户控件）授权失败时调用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an control, called when a static control (or server or user control) fails authorization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数采用静态控件`webPart`作为参数，其中`webPart`失败授权检查。The constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check. 静态控件是指在 Web 页上，而不是以编程方式添加的标记中声明。A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically. 构造函数将返回的新实例控件，添加到页面的控制树中代替`webPart`。The constructor returns a new instance of an control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public UnauthorizedWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Public Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
public: UnauthorizedWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);

param.name: originalID
param.span: 包含原始服务器控件或原始用户控件的 ID 的字符串，这类控件被添加到 中，成为了 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a to participate in a Web Parts application.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 一个字符串，包含原始控件的类型的名称。

span.span: A string containing the name of the original control's type.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 一个字符串，包含用户控件（如果原始控件是用户控件）的相对虚拟路径。

span.span: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 包含 控件的 ID 的字符串，该控件包装原始服务器控件或原始用户控件。

span.span: A string containing the ID of the control that wraps the original server or user control.

summary.span: 初始化 控件的新实例，在某个动态 控件（或者服务器控件或用户控件）授权失败时调用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an control, called when a dynamic control (or server or user control) fails authorization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数中调用时动态或其他服务器控件失败其授权检查。The constructor is called when a dynamic or other server control fails its authorization check. 动态控件是指添加到页上，以编程方式或通过从 Web 部件的目录的用户可以控制。A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls. 构造函数将返回的新实例控件替换身份验证失败的动态控件。The constructor returns a new instance of an control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .
